problem.markdown: >>Examine the table below and indicate which means of transporation is most energy efficient.<< ( ) airplane ( ) passenger car (x) train ( ) bus MJ = megajoule. Passenger-kilometer is one person traveling one kilometer. [explanation] The most efficient mode of transportation is that one that uses the lowest quantity of energy (MJ) per distance traveled (km). [explanation]
problem.p: Examine the table below and indicate which means of transporation is most energy efficient.

choicegroup.label: Examine the table below and indicate which means of transporation is most energy efficient.

problem.strong: Passenger-kilometer is one person traveling one kilometer.

div.p: The most efficient mode of transportation is that one that uses the lowest quantity of energy (MJ) per distance traveled (km).
